article.headline: Montana State 73, Dickinson State 71
article.story: DICKINSON, N.D. (AP) -- Chad Glasser scored 17 points to lead Dickinson State to a 79-60 nonconference men's basketball victory over Montana Tech on Saturday. Glasser had two 3-pointers and dished out three assists for the Blue Hawks (7-6). Derek Miller and Donny English added 10 points apiece. Maurice Williams had 14 points and Luke Harman 10 for the Orediggers (6-7). Dickinson State had 13 steals and Montana Tech had 30 turnovers. The Blue Hawks led 39-30 at halftime.
